DataElement.preferredName: MFLIE Hardship 24 Hour Nausea Close Relationships Affect 7 Point Likert Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric response to a question of the hardship nausea has imposed on those closest to a person in the past 24 hours.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: MFLIE Hardship 24 Hour Nausea Close Relationships Affect
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The status of one's ability to perform activities of daily living and participate socially and occupationally._Something not easily done, accomplished, comprehended, or solved._Past; before the present time._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::24_In modern usage, an hour is defined as a unit of time 60 minutes, or 3600 seconds in length. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day._A disorder characterized by a queasy sensation and/or the urge to vomit._A relationship bound by mutual interests or loyalties._Human beings in general._To be influenced by or change.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The status of one's ability to perform activities of daily living and participate socially and occupationally.:Something not easily done, accomplished, comprehended, or solved.

Something not easily done, accomplished, comprehended, or solved.

Property.preferredName: Past Integer::24 Hour Nausea Close Relationship People Affected
Property.preferredDefinition: Past; before the present time.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::24:In modern usage, an hour is defined as a unit of time 60 minutes, or 3600 seconds in length. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.:A disorder characterized by a queasy sensation and/or the urge to vomit.:A relationship bounc by mutual interests or loyalities.:Human beings in general.:To be influenced by or changed.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.
A disorder characterized by a queasy sensation and/or the urge to vomit.
A relationship bound by mutual interests or loyalties.
To be influenced by or changed.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of no agreement or ability.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
The precise location of something; a spatially limited location.

A psychometric scale commonly used in questionnaires where a respondent is asked to evaluate an opinion according to subjective or objective criteria, by rating their level of agreement or disagreement with a statement.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
